sentences.en: A queen sat at her window and embroidered on an ebony frame.
sentences.cn: 有一位皇后坐在窗边在黑檀木的框上刺绣.

sentences.en: An ebony mountain peak rises from a glacier on South Georgia Island.
sentences.cn: 一座乌黑的山峰高耸在南乔治亚岛的冰川之上.

sentences.en: Ebony fingerboard, both jujube wood and ebony sets can be supplied; rosewood end pin, metal tailpiece.
sentences.cn: 乌木指板, 枣木配件和乌木配件两种, 红木尾柱, 金属拉线板.

sentences.en: Ebony is a hard black wood.
sentences.cn: 黑檀树是一种黑色而坚硬的树木.

sentences.en: Ebony master produced in the Sichuan Basin in China, especially in the Chengdu Plain.
sentences.cn: 乌木主产于中国四川盆地, 尤其是成都平原.

sentences.en: Fitted with ebony , rosewood or boxwood three different kinds of sets.
sentences.cn: 配件有乌木 、 玫瑰木和黄杨木三种不同装配.

sentences.en: Fitted with jujube wood sets or ebony sets.
He had rich, soft ebony hair.
sentences.cn: 他一头浓密、柔软的黑发。

sentences.en: Leon: And Walter has the Ebony Stone in his possession?
sentences.cn: 利: 而沃尔特拥有着漆黑之石 吗 ?

sentences.en: Leon: You promised, answer me. What is the Ebony stone?
sentences.cn: 利: 像你保证过的, 回答我, 什么是漆黑之石!

sentences.en: Magic Mirror: Lips red as the rose, hair black as ebony, skin white as the snow.
sentences.cn: 魔镜: 她唇红如玫瑰, 发黑如乌木, 皮肤白皙如白雪.

sentences.en: May say these become the ebony the wood all is the similar center outstanding people.
sentences.cn: 可以说这些成为乌木的木头都是同类中的佼佼者.

sentences.en: Mirror: Lips red as the rose. Hair black as ebony. Skin white as snow.
sentences.cn: 魔镜: 她的嘴唇红如玫瑰, 头发黑如乌木, 皮肤嫩如白雪.

sentences.en: She is as white as snow, as red as rose and as black as ebony.
sentences.cn: 她是洁白如雪, 红如玫瑰和黑如乌木.

sentences.en: The straight white part in her ebony hair seemed to divide the back of her head in half.
sentences.cn: 她乌黑的头发中有条笔直的白色分缝，仿佛将她的后脑勺一分为二。

words.tran_cn: 乌木制的，[木]黑檀木制的；似木的，黑檀木色的
